/etc/apache2/apache2.conf:User ${APACHE_: it also says when i restart apache that it cannot qualify the domain name
so how do i make it work for my ip address
you should edit /etc/hosts as such: 127.0.0.1 localhost.localdomain localhost myhostname
where myhostname is your actual box hostname
if you have a permanent ip, i would use the 127.0.0.1 line in  /etc/hosts. just my experience.
yes i did, try it, if it doesnt work, change 127.0.0.1 in your httpd.conf to your i-net ip
apache2 in ubuntu has a httpd.conf but the actual conf used is named 'default' in /etc/apache2/sites-available/default. or used to be. try http://apache.org
you must edit that file or forget it!
